TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DispatchWrapper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Wraps objects the marshaler should marshal as a `VT_DISPATCH`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use to wrap objects the marshaler should marshal as a `VT_DISPATCH`. This wrapper will force objects to be marshaled out as `VT_DISPATCH`. If the object does not support `IDispatch` then an exception will be thrown.
[!CODE [System.Runtime.InteropServices.DispatchWrapper#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dispatchwrapper#1)]
For more information on `VT_DISPATCH`, please see the existing documentation for `VARENUM::VT_DISPATCH` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to be wrapped and converted to <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.VarEnum">.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DispatchWrapper"> class with the object being wrapped.
Gets the object wrapped by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DispatchWrapper">.
